bboxes.reason: Bounding box 7 primarily covers the Speed/Mode button, including its pressing area, which is the interactive control element for this feature.
Bounding box 8 best fits the timer_button by properly covering the physical dial knob, which is the interactive portion of the Timer control element.
Bounding box 11 captures the pressing area of the UV button, which is the primary interactive element associated with the UV function.
Bounding box 6 best captures the power button's pressing area, which aligns with the execution criteria described for a button.

Bounding box 10 captures the button associated with the 'Ionizer' control element, including its pressing area, which matches the Button Selection Criteria (2b). Other bounding boxes either focus on the label or irrelevant elements.
